page.title: 14Chillington in Summer.
page.content:
Birds fly high and low Always singing as they go. I sometimes hear the cars go by. I sometimes wonder why. At night when I am in bed, Noises flow into my head. The noise of a car The noise of the bar With people shouting,talking, singing.
In the morning Spring is back, The birds are singing in the trees.
In my village we play down by the stream, We talk, shout and splash. Sometimes there are ducks on the stream and frogs too. I would like to live down there and be a little flowing gleam.
